entries: You spent years working as a clerk to a functionary in Absalom's government. Your service taught you a thing or two about rousing speeches and manipulating the city's bureaucracy.
Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Charisma or Intelligence, and one is a free ability boost.
You're trained in the {@skill Diplomacy} skill and the {@skill Lore||Government Lore} skill. You gain the {@feat Group Impression} skill feat.
